title: Bandits Attack Ibeto Community in Niger State
description: Bandits entered Ibeto in Niger State, killing and kidnapping residents, primarily young women, with many still displaced and no assistance provided.
description_with_more_context: Bandits entered Ibeto in Niger State, killing and kidnapping residents, primarily young women, with many still displaced and no assistance provided.

title: Bandits Raid Communities in Kwara North
description: Bandits have been killing and kidnapping people in Edu and Patigi local government areas of Kwara State, with ongoing terror in the region.
description_with_more_context: Bandits have been killing and kidnapping people in Edu and Patigi local government areas of Kwara State, with ongoing terror in the region.

title: Survivor Recounts Bandit Attack in Niger State Community
description: A survivor shares ordeal from recent bandit strike in a Niger State community, involving violence and abductions.
description_with_more_context: A survivor shares ordeal from recent bandit strike in a Niger State community, involving violence and abductions.
